name: Carrion's Price
description: The Corax can determine the cause of death of any corpse they examine. A raven-spirit teaches this Gift.

name: Detect the Broken
description: The Corax can sense when something is damaged, broken, or otherwise not functioning properly. A raven-spirit teaches this Gift.

name: Raven's Gleaning
description: The Corax can quickly scan an area for anything unusual or out of place. A raven-spirit teaches this Gift.

name: Shadow's Caress
description: The Corax can blend into shadows, becoming nearly invisible. A shadow-spirit teaches this Gift.
